const vec4 lo_col =  vec4 (1., 0., 0., 1.); // red
const vec4 ho_col =  vec4 (0., 1., 0., 1.); // green

void mainImage( out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord )
{
    vec2 uv = fragCoord/iResolution.xy; // normalized pixel coordinates 0..1
    float frag = (uv.x+uv.y)*0.5; // do a little magic to make it diagonal ;)
    frag = clamp(frag,0.,1.); // clamp range to 0..1
    fragColor = mix(lo_col, ho_col, frag); // aka lerp
}
